name: GoGreen
0:
”Alexa, open Go Green”
”Alexa, start Go Green”
”Alexa, launch Go Green”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: go green
des:
About:
Go Green skill is about giving an easy tip of the day, which can help protect the environment and conserve natural resources for current & future generations. 

We are encouraging people to listen ONE tip of the day and try to act on it.

Features:
This skill is built to tell 'go green' tip of the day.

How it works:
Just invoke the skill by saying: "Alexa, open go green" and you will get tip of the day.
